title: Bachelor of Business Administration in Economics
description: Economics is the study of business performance, the functioning of regional, national, and global markets, and the mastering of analytical techniques that drive decision-making and understanding market behavior. The primary focus is on problem definition, model development, data gathering and analysis, model solution, and report generation in consumer behavior, business behavior and price determination.
careers: Financial Analysis, Business Analysis, Statistician, Economist
school: Department of Economics, Finance, and Quantitative Analysis
